name: Dungeon Dice Towers
description:
A tower defense game where your towers are determined by die rolls.

You play on a World with two sides. Whenever you place your defences they will be placed on both sides of the map since dice also have an opposite side.

Controls:

- Drag and drop with your left mouse Button to place your available dice as Turrets on the map. However you may only place them on the top side of the map.

- Place a Turret on another one with the same value to perform an Upgrade on it.

- You may reroll both of your dice once before placing them down by pressing the reroll icon  next to your inventory.

- Press the Flip button to switch your view between the two sides of the map.

Turrets:

1 - Freeze

2 - Shock

3 - Mark

4 - Buff

5 - Damage

6 - Burn
